text: Charles Holzer (born June 24, 1969) is an equestrian who represents the United States Virgin Islands. He competed in the individual jumping event at the 1992 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1969 births Category:Living people Category:United States Virgin Islands male equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of the United States Virgin Islands Category:Equestrians at the 1992 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from New York City
title: Charles Holzer
